actions.text: Amendment SA 2914 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 3. Record Vote Number: 130.

Amendment SA 2914 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4022; text: CR S4022) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need for funding for innovative scientific research.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2914 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 3. Record Vote Number: 130.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2914 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 3. Record Vote Number: 130.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2914 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2910.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need for funding for innovative scientific research.
